title: inserted by regulation 5(d) of the European Union (Modifications of Statutory
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Central Bank Act 1942
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Central Bank Act 1942 
(Section 32D) (Certain Financial Vehicles Dedicated Levy) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 8 July 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited central bank act 1942 (section 32d) (certain financial vehicle dedicated levy) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation come operation 8 july 2023

title: inserted by regulation 5(d) of the European Union (Modifications of Statutory
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Central Bank
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Central Bank 
Act 1942 (Section 32D) (Certain Financial Vehicles Dedicated Levy) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 335 of 2021).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean central bank act 1942 (section 32d) (certain financial vehicle dedicated levy) regulation 2021 (s.i no 335 2021)

title: inserted by regulation 5(d) of the European Union (Modifications of Statutory
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for the Schedule
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for the Schedule 

the following: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th July, 2023.

title: inserted by regulation 5(d) of the European Union (Modifications of Statutory
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Central Bank Act 1942 
(Section 32D) (Certain Financial Vehicles Dedicated Levy) Regulations 2021 
(S.I. No. 335 of 2021). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [351] 5
